text: Robert Lovett may refer to: * Robert A. Lovett (1895-1986), United States Secretary of Defense * Robert Morss Lovett (1870–1956), American educator and writer; acting Governor of the United States Virgin Islands * Robert Q. Lovett, film editor * Robert S. Lovett (1860-1932), chairman of the Southern Pacific Company Executive Committee 1909-1913\. * Sir Robert Lovett (17th c.) of Liscombe in Buckinghamshire, England (see Lovett baronets)
title: Robert Lovett
